resources.string:
Hi, my name is Aleks. 
I love fish. 
The kind that is alive and swims around in an aquarium or river. 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 
I like eating fish, too. 
And sometimes I even go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 
I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should ask someone else about fishing, though.
